meanings: (동물의) (같은 종류의) herd, (양·염소·새 등의) flock, (개·늑대 등의) pack, (물고기의) shoal, school, (곤충의) swarm, (...
(사리에 어긋남) unreasonableness, irrationality, ―하다 (be) unreasonable, unfair, unnatural
(불가능) impossibility, ―하다 (be) impossible, be beyond one's power

vlive.korean: 다른 무리들과 떼를 지어 다닙니까 혼자 다닙니까? Do you swim with a pod, or alone? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
vlive.english: Do you swim with a pod, or alone?

vlive.korean: 조금 무리겠죠? 그렇죠? It won't look so great. Right? 듣기 View video OUI ENTERTAINMENT : [#YO_LIVE]요한이를 바라봄🌼
vlive.english: It won't look so great. Right?

vlive.korean: 어떻게 이렇게 생방 앞에서 무리한걸 하겠습니까? How can I do the impossible in front of live show? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스 안녕! 보고싶다 ❤️
vlive.english: How can I do the impossible in front of live show?

vlive.korean: 그런 무리가 많이... 무리? There is so much... Too much?? 듣기 View video AB6IX : ❤🧡
vlive.english: There is so much... Too much??

vlive.korean: 우리가 너무 무리한 부탁을... Maybe we asked too much. 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🐷꿀🐷꿀🐷즈🐷

examples.korean: Crowds of people poured into the street. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람들이 무리 지어 거리로 쏟아져 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Crowds of people poured into the street. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They came in flocks to see the procession. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 행렬을 보려고 무리 지어 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They came in flocks to see the procession. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Bend gently to the left without straining. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너무 무리하지 말고 부드럽게 왼쪽으로 굽히세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Bend gently to the left without straining. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was engulfed by a crowd of reporters. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 한 무리의 기자들에게 완전히 둘러싸여 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was engulfed by a crowd of reporters. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: People flocked in their thousands to see her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람들이 수천 명씩 무리를 지어 그녀를 보러 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: People flocked in their thousands to see her. Add to Wordbook
